def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = [0] + p + [0]

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = p[int(a[i])]

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = [0] + f

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = f[a[i]]

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(input().split())
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f.insert(0, 0)

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = str(f[int(a[i])])

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    num = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))[:n]
    f = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))[:n]
    for i in range(len(num)):
        num[i] = f[num[i]-1]
    print(''.join(map(str, num)))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = [0] + p

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = p[a[i]]

    a = ' '.join(map(str, a))

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    num = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())
    f = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())
    for i in range(len(num)):
        num[i] = f[num[i] - 1]
    print(''.join(map(str, num)))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
